Name: yara-community/anti-debug_anti-vm
Description: Detection of anti-debug and anti-virtualization techniques used by malware to evade automated analysis.

Name: yara-community/capabilities
Description: Detect capabilities that do not fit into any of the other categories; They are useful to know for analysis but may not be malicious indicators on their own.

Name: yara-community/crypto
Description: Detection and existence of cryptographic algorithms.

Name: yara-community/cve
Description: Identification of specific Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVEs).

Name: yara-community/exploit-kits
Description: Detection and existence of Exploit Kits.

Name: yara-community/maldocs
Description: Find if they have been crafted to leverage malicious code.

Name: yara-community/packers
Description: Detect well-known software packers, that can be used by malware to hide itself.
